prompt: Change the transformation layers in the following implementation to increase the accuracy on image classification tasks.
You should answer not only the transform you modified but with ***FULL CODES INCLUDING EVERYTHING NOT CHANGED***
You have to reply with full transform codes, don't be afraid of actually reducing the accuracy.
***Strictly check and make sure at least one transformation being modified.***

```
import torchvision.transforms as transforms

def transform(norm):
    return transforms.Compose([
        transforms.Resize(256),
        transforms.CenterCrop(256),
        transforms.RandomHorizontalFlip(),
        transforms.ToTensor(),
        transforms.Normalize(*norm)])
```
